participant_1.background:
I do not care about the weather as long as I can play video games.
my inspiration is clasical music.
I am an only child, but I have a large extended family who are all supportive of my dance team.
I have a tattoo on my back that they don't know about.
I worry about what people think of my brother.

participant_2.background:
I don't have any kids, but I'm close to my family.
I collect interesting rocks that I find along my wheelchair paths.
I want to share my photography with the world.
I eat healthy meals and cook at home to make sure I am making the best choices for my health.
i like photography.

content.text: Hello, I'm glad to meet you! What's your name?
Hi, my name is participant_2. How are you?
I'm doing well, thank you. I'm interested in learning more about you.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm a photographer and I like to cook healthy meals at home. I also collect interesting rocks that I find along my wheelchair paths.
That's really interesting! I've never met a photographer before. What's your favorite thing about photography?
I love the way I can capture moments in time and share them with others. It's also a great way to express myself creatively.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm sure you're very talented.
What kind of rocks do you collect?
I collect all sorts of rocks, but I'm particularly interested in finding ones that are unique or have interesting features. I have a whole collection of rocks that I've found on my wheelchair paths.
That's really cool! I'd love to see them sometime.
Sure, I'd be happy to show you them.
What's your favorite healthy meal that you cook at home?
I love making homemade soups. They're easy to make and they're always delicious.
That sounds delicious! I love soup.
Me too! I love how there are so many different kinds of soup that you can make.
I agree! I'm really glad I met you. You seem like a really interesting person.
Thank you! I'm glad I met you too. I hope we can talk again soon.
